masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "We've got a situation at City Credit Union. Panda has hostages, but he keeps... pausing dramatically? Every time he monologues about 'the long dark night of the soul,' there's like a 30-second window. Can you work with that?"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Time your entry during Greg's dramatic pauses
  • Rescue hostages without triggering his fight response
  • Consider: is Greg even aware he took hostages?
